titleStmt.title: Cupids messenger: or, A trusty friend stored with sundry sorts of serious, wittie, pleasant, amorous, and delightfull letters. Newly written
Cupids messenger: or, A trusty friend stored with sundry sorts of serious, wittie, pleasant, amorous, and delightfull letters. Newly written

publicationStmt.publisher: By M[iles] F[lesher] and are to be sold by Francis Groue ouer against the Sarazens head without Newgate,

notesStmt.note: "App[arently]. an earlier ed., with author's inits. "W.J." and imprint: J. Chorlton, 1608, was in the Hessisches Landes- und Hochschulbibliothek, Darmstadt, but was destroyed during World War II; see Notes and Queries, April, 1978, p. 129"--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

person.persName: Francis Groue ouer against the Sarazens head without Newgate
